Rulings.Base:
1. You cannot activate this effect during the Damage Step.
2 You can activate this effect more than once during the same Chain. For example if your opponent Chains "My Body as a Shield" to this effect, you can Chain by activating this card's effect again.
3. Tributing 1 face-up 'Naturia' monster is a cost.
4. This effect does not target.
5. If your opponent Special Summons several monsters at once, you can activate this effect to destroy them all.
6. If the monster that was Special Summoned is flipped face-down by a card Chained to this effect, it is still destroyed.
